The baby blues
As many as 8 out of 10 women 
get what is commonly called 
‘the baby blues’. It normally 
begins within a few days of the 
baby’s birth and goes away 
within a few weeks.
How does it affect you?
Common reactions are to 
burst into tears for no obvious 
reason, or to feel on top of 
the world one minute and 
miserable the next. It is not 
unusual to feel anxious or 
tense,	lacking	in	co
